div.div: Sul Ross St. vs. East Texas Baptist

tr.td: ETBU wins the toss and will receive the ball
Eli Lopez kickoff 33 yards to the ETBU32, B.Ashton return 7 yards to the ETBU39 (Damian Espinoza).
